original_title: Michael Lee Firkins: Mastering Lead Guitar
overview: Accomplished guitarist Michael Lee Firkins shares his secrets for mastering the art of playing lead guitar in this easy-to-follow tutorial that also includes an overview of the enviable styles of Jimmy Page and Joe Walsh. Firkins tackles a range of topics, from scales and routines, whammy bar effects, blues leads and tapping effects, to open-string tapping styles and advanced sweeping and arpeggio techniques.
title: Michael Lee Firkins: Mastering Lead Guitar
